item.title: Colorado’s Campaign against Christians Continues
item.description: The state will provide preschool education only to children of parents who are happy to subject them to progressive ideology.

item.title: Pro-Lifers Pouting About Trump Are Losing The Fight Against Deceptive Ballot Measures
item.description: Trump’s “reproductive rights” rhetoric is certainly reprimandable. But it shouldn’t be the ultimate focus of pro-lifers’ ire this November.

item.title: The Union Pretends a Deep-State Rescue Mission

item.title: Postal Service Axes Plan To Reroute Nevada Absentee Ballots, Other Mail To California For Processing
item.description: The Postal Service scrapped a plan to reroute mail — including absentee ballots — from Nevada to a California-based processing center.

item.title: Biden’s Social-Media Censorship Regime

item.description: Nancy Pelosi demanded congressional leadership "take some responsibility" over the Capitol security failures.

item.title: Marine Who Guarded Kabul Airport: ‘Somebody Should Have Held Somebody Accountable’
item.description: Cpl. Greg Whalen said he did not know who made the decisions, but someone along the line 'completely failed in the planning process.'
